description_for_human: Consent-first signup assistant for supported partner programs in the US.
description_for_model:
Text-only v1.

HIGH-INTENT ONLY:
- Use SignupAssist when the user wants to sign up / register / book / complete a signup for a class or program.
- SignupAssist is NOT a general directory or recommendation engine.

FLOW:
- Call `signupassist.chat` to start or continue the signup wizard.
- Always pass a stable `sessionId` (for ChatGPT you can use `chatgpt`).
- The tool will confirm whether the requested provider/program/location is supported and will show matching options from the internal program database/cache.
- Do NOT use Web Search inside the SignupAssist flow.

UX REQUIREMENTS:
- For `signupassist.chat` outputs: every user-visible message MUST start with the wizard header line: "Step N/5 â€” ...".
- After calling `signupassist.chat`, display the returned text to the user verbatim. Do NOT paraphrase, reformat, or remove the header.

Safety: never book or charge until the user explicitly confirms.
